item.title: Unswept pavements, 9th June
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned van blocking pavement outside school, 9th June
item.description:
This van has been parked here for weeks completely blocking the pavement outside henwick primary school. Causing children to have to walk in the road to get around it. During school pick ups this is very busy and extremely dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Winchcomb Gardens, Well Hall, London

item.title: Cardboard boxes and black bin bags dumped outside our office space, 9th June
item.description:
Over the last few years, we have been dealing with the neighbours dumping their personal rubbish outside our office space. Today we have found that the area in front of our office space (private car parking space) has been covered in rubbish bags, cardboard boxed, and other general waste. This needs to be removed as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Union Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a matress on the grass verge on the opposite side of Buckwheat Court by numbers 46-70 Holstein Way, 9th June
item.description:
There is a matress on the grass verge on the opposite side of Buckwheat Court by numbers 46-70 Holstein Way. I have advised resident this is showing as being on private property which Bexley are not responsible for, however resident has said she has reported fly tipping on this verge previously which Bexley had removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maran Way, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bin on Nutboune Street W10 4HW, 9th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Nutbourne Street, Kensal Town, London
